alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 4:22PM EDT until July 23 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gaylord has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Presque Isle County in northern Michigan... Northeastern Cheboygan County in northern Michigan... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 422 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alverno, or 7 miles southeast of Cheboygan, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Black Lake, Nine Mile Point and Huron Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
